projectGridLines.title: iCSM Implementation Support
projectGridLines.description:
Description:  Supporting the preparation work and implementation of iCSM (Intelligent Clinical Supply Management) System (S4/Hana). This will include supporting data migration activities, UAT support, Study Setup support etc.

Skill sets: Understanding the fundamentals of the Pharma domain including the Clinical supply, good documentation practices, basic testing skills.

Traits expectation: Committed, Self-motivated, critical thinking.

Expected learning: Exposure to a large-scale enterprise implementation and system functionality in Clinical Supply.

Specific courses required for project execution:  Trainings will be provided as part of the onboarding.
